rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a level counter on another target creature you control. If it doesn't have level up, it gains “This creature gets +1/+1 for each level counter on it” and level up {2}. [i](The creature gains “{2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

promo

At the beginning of your end step, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of the following that happened this turn.
• You gained 2 or more life.
• You lost 2 or more life.
• You attacked with two or more creatures.
• You drew two or more cards.
• You cast two or more spells.
